ordersText.title: DREAD JUDGEMENT
ordersText.general: In resolution step of a won combat while resolving this order, you may force your opponent to choose 1 routed unit before the retreat phase and destroy it. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: ADEPTUS ARBITES
ordersText.general: When resolving this order, you may gain 1 free Stormtrooper on planet with City in active system. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: PSYCHIC MASTERY
ordersText.general: When you reveal this order token, draw 3 Event cards. Choose 1 of drawn cards and discard the others. Put the chosen card aside and take it during Event Phase. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: INEVITABLE EXCAVATION
ordersText.general: During an orbital strike gain 1 [D], and you may spend 1 [M] to gain 1 asset from the world the strike was on. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: TERROR STRIKE
ordersText.general: Bastions do not prevent this strike. You may either  spend 1 [M] to force your enemy to rout 1 unit or spent 2 [M] to force your enemy to retreat 1 unit. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

eventsText.title: BURNER OF WORLDS
eventsText.general: When you are defending a world with at least 2 of your units, you may discard this card at reinforce step of combat, to destroy all units and structures on this world.

eventsText.title: PSIONIC WARFARE
eventsText.general: When you reveal an order during Operations Phase, you may discard this card, to choose your opponents order upgrade and turn it face down, making is unusable this round.

eventsText.title: CUTTHROATS FOR HIRE
eventsText.general: At the end of reinforce step of combat, you may discard this card to force your opponent to either  choose and rout 1 of his units if you are attacking or force your opponent to choose and retreat 1 unit if you are defending.

eventsText.title: THEOSOPMOMY
eventsText.general: Disruption in the warp allows it to move in all directions.

eventsText.title: RADICALS AND PURITANS
eventsText.general: Purchase 1 structure reducing it's materiel cost by 1 or destroy 1 structure on a friendly world to gain destroyed structure materiel cost increased by 1.

eventsText.title: RORMIDABLE RESOLVE
eventsText.general: Place 1 Stormtrooper on any friendly world and 1 Inquisitorial Cruisers on any friendly  or uncontrolled void in system with a City or 1 Stormtrooper on any friendly world.

eventsText.title: AUTOSAVANT SAGE ANALYZE
eventsText.general: Get 1 combat upgrade reducing its cost by 1 for each planet with city in a system with no enemy units.

eventsText.title: TOTAL AUTHORITY
eventsText.general: Discard this card during first turn in Planning Phase. If you do, you may place additional order token (5 in total).

combatText.title: STRATEGIC EXCRUCIATION
combatText.general: Any Unrouted Unit: Your opponent cannot use Primary effect from his next reveled card.

combatText.title: SHADOW ASSIGNMENT
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: If you have more [M] than your opponent, force your opponent to either rout 1 unit or discard a die of your choice.

combatText.title: PSYKER SHIELD
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Rogue Trader: You may spend 2 (S) to gain 1 reinforcement token in this area.

combatText.title: UNQUESTIONABLE WISDOM
combatText.general: If you are attacking, look at your opponent's facedown combat card. *newpara* Gain 1 [B], 1 [S] or 1 [M].
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: Play 1 combat card from your hand. Do not resolve it's abilities, but gain it's combat icons until the end of this execution round.

combatText.title: FRENZON IMPLANTS
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: You may spend 2 (B) to convert all of your [M] to [B].

combatText.title: SANCTIONED PSYKER
combatText.general: Your opponent may spend 1 [B] to gain 1 (B). If he does not, force your opponent to lose 1 [S].
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: Your opponent rerolls 2 dies of your choice.

combatText.title: CRUSADERS DEFENSE
combatText.unit: Stromtrooper/Deathwatch/Cruiser: Rally 1 of your units. *newpara* Gain 1 (S) for each [S] you have, to a maximum of 4.

combatText.title: INCONCEIVABLE CUSTOMISATION
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Rogue Trader: Gain 1 (B) for each [B] you have, to a maximum of 3. Your opponent gains 1 (B) for each [B] he has, to a maximum of 3.

combatText.title: FAITH GUIDANCE
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Rogue Trader: Choose your opponent's unit up to command level 2. Force your opponent to rout that unit, unless he spends dice equal to that units morale value.

combatText.title: READER OF THE TAROT
combatText.general: If you are defending, opponent looses 3 (B). *newpara* If you are attacking, your opponent cannnot gain (S) during this execution round.
combatText.unit: Valkyrie/Black Ship: Gain up to 3 (S) for each unrouted unit and bastion.

combatText.title: DEFENSIVE BARRAGE
combatText.general: Gain 1 [D]. *newpara* You may spend 1 [M] to move 1 Command level 0 or 2 [M] to move 1 Command level 1 unit to adjacent area. This can start a new combat after resolving this combat.
combatText.unit: Valkyrie/Black Ship: Gain 1 free reinforcement token in this area.

combatText.title: HELLSTRIKE MISSILES
combatText.unit: Valkyrie/Black Ship: Choose 1 of your opponent's routed units and destroy that unit.

combatText.title: TRUESILVER ARMOUR
combatText.unit: Grey Knight/Black Ship: During this combat, health value of your units is increased by 1.

combatText.title: TELEPORT STRIKE
combatText.general: Choose 1 of your opponents units. That unit suffers damage first during this execution round.
combatText.unit: Grey Knights/Black Ships: During this execution round, if your opponent has to assign any damage, he assigns 3 additional damage.
